entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
